comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: American Red Cross Building – Then and Now (90+ years) Several architectural and landscaping details were completed since the original photograph was taken. Red crosses were placed on the portico peak and above the main door, and granite baluster railings were added to the grounds. It's evident that trees do grow! ;-)   and the grounds now include numerous Cherry trees – that are gorgeous when blooming...   An interior view of the Assembly Room may be seen here.   "American Red Cross Building (2007)" by Just Me     "American Red Cross Building (c.1920)" by Schultz
